response.overview: Mieke Kruger dreams of being a professional dancer. When Wimpie Steyn, the coolest guy in Daspoort, holds auditions for a new back-up dancer, Mieke enlists her little brother, Andr√©, to take her to the audition. Mieke has no professional training or the traditional figure of a dancer, but she doesn't let that stand in her way. She steams ahead and gives a performance that Wimpie Steyn will not soon forget.
response.title: Dans dat die biesies bewe
